description: In May of 2020, a standoff between a small-town sheriff (Joaquin Phoenix) and mayor (Pedro Pascal) sparks a powder keg as neighbour is pitted against neighbour in Eddington, New Mexico.
title: Eddington

description: Papa Smurf is captured by the evil sorcerer brothers Razamel and Gargamel. Smurfette will do everything she can to save him by travelling to the real world, with the help of the Smurfs and their new allies...
title: Les Schtroumpfs [VERSION FRANÇAISE]

description: A murder strikes a community, and conflict escalates between the son of the victims and the that of the accused. A hard-hitting drama about the grief of guilt, in which tension reigns.
title: Fragment

description: Papa Smurf is captured by the evil sorcerer brothers Razamel and Gargamel. Smurfette will do everything she can to save him by travelling to the real world, with the help of the Smurfs and their new allies...
title: Smurfs [ENGLISH VERSION]

description: An HOA turns out to be more hellish than usual in this wildly amusing, creature-packed horror/comedy about newly minted suburbanites forced to take part in a battle against monstrous forces.
title: Hold the Fort

description: Following the death of his wife in a senseless attack, a man decides to seek justice in a daring way. A brilliant thriller with an important moral dilemma at its core.
title: Verdict, The

description: An electrifying reinvention of ‘60s Euro-spy films from the gifted makers of AMER and LET THE CORPSES TAN, starring Italian screen icon Fabio Testi. An astonishing act of imaginative visual storytelling.
title: Reflet Dans Un Diamant Mort

description: A seemingly cute, slightly sad, time-travelling romance somehow hasn’t worked out the way it should have. What went wrong?
title: Rewrite

description: A young woman faces a difficult decision when a group of activists take up arms against an affluent family, hoping to plant the seed that sows a rebellion.
title: mort n'existe pas, La

description: Several generations of women, separated by time and space, are stalked by the same terrifying curse in Pedro Martín-Calero's prize-winning supernatural horror debut.
title: Wailing, The

description: After her sister's disappearance, Ju-young moves into their apartment. Determined to find out more, she sets her sight on her neighbours, who only have one thing to say - could she stop making so much nois...
title: Noise

description: A rebellious, sword-swallowing bearded girl decides to leave her carnival sideshow home behind in search of love and adventure. A debut feature that’s charming, dryly funny, and filled with a fairy-tale ae...
title: Bearded Girl, The

description: A rebellious, sword-swallowing bearded girl decides to leave her carnival sideshow home behind in search of love and adventure. A debut feature that’s charming, dryly funny, and filled with a fairy-tale ae...
title: Bearded Girl, The

description: A virus is sweeping the globe, causing anyone who touches a kitty to become one! Executive director Miike delivers a furry, purring parody of the natural-horror subgenre, an anime cataclysm of cuteness!
title: Nyaight of the Living Cat Episodes 1 2 3 4

description: Rylee meets her pop-star idol, only to find he’s a drug-addicted faker. When she decides to help him get sober, her good intentions become a road to a living hell.
title: Sweetness

description: Helena Howard, Bella Thorne and Chloe Cherry star in an intense tale of college besties on a hard-partying girl's trip that turns into a bloody battle for their right to exist.
title: Find Your Friends

description: In one of 2025's major genre breakouts, four college friends find themselves on an infinite, unending road, forcing each of them to decide how to confront their fate in an unnerving journey into the unknow...
title: It Ends

description: An assortment of animated vignettes from the wry, inventive French director, prompted by nightly phone calls with his daughter. Voiced and narrated by Pierre Niney!
title: Maya, donne-moi un titre

description: Fantasia’s annual mixed bag of short-form anime works returns with a focus on young, independent anime creators, by turns weird, wild, wistful, and whimsical.
title: Anime no bento 2025

description: The distinctive tokusatsu franchise marks its 20th anniversary in grand style, with gothic gravitas and gruesome monsters, mystical symbolism and elegant steampunk accents.
title: Garo: Taiga

description: We're off to a great start with a selection of 8 thunderous short films that perfectly represent the various FWCQ programs, both in their diversity and for their exceptional qualities.
title: Départ Canon!

description: Biblical myths and Baltic folklore meet fuzz guitar, funky bass, and a big, bold brass section in the Soviet Union’s first rock-opera movie, a rare gem of Lithuanian cinema gorgeously restored at last!
title: Devil's Bride, The

description: With unlikely allies, a plucky young indigenous girl performs miracles across Bolivia’s sublime landscapes, where survival becomes a sacred, elemental act of love and divine ritual.
title: Cielo

description: A poet in Longueuil refuses to sell his house to an unscrupulous property developer. Jean-Marc E. Roy and André Forcier deliver a very unusual film in which reality and fiction intertwine.
title: Ville Jacques Carton

description: Two teenage hoodlums aim for better lives for themselves, and fighting in the ring is how they’ll get there. A convincing coming-of-age drama with a big heart to balance out the bruises and black eyes.
title: Blazing Fists

description: A curious and resourceful dog senses something supernatural is threatening his owner in this one-of-a-kind ghost story featuring Indy, who delivers one of the greatest dog performances in movie history.
title: Good Boy

description: There are many ways to lose your cool...a rollercoaster of emotions ranging from giggles to uneasy gasps, or vice versa!
title: Horreurs All-Dressed

description: Hanah can’t get support for her feminist revenge film. Cheol can’t get funding because his script lacks female perspective. A quirky, immensely entertaining comedy about the unique world of filmmaking.
title: Last Woman on Earth, The

description: A dive into the twisted shadows writhing under the rising sun, a riot of the beautiful, bizarre, radical, and outrageous, charting an underground art movement that still echoes hauntingly today.
title: Japanese Avant-Garde Pioneers

description: In 1967, three Hong Kong friends on the run flee to Vietnam to make their fortune, only to face the horrors of war and the pain of betrayal, in John Woo's 1990 masterwork.
title: Bullet in the Head

description: A year after confronting the Soul of the Woods, the “Little Monsters Club” must now face Babao, the spirit of a murderous, psychopathic teacher long dead.
title: Écorchés - Partie 2, Les

description: Eight films. Eight countries. Worlds of brilliance. Fantasia’s annual showcase of next-level sci-fi shorts returns with stunning works from China to Britain, Poland to South Korea and beyond.
title: International Science-Fiction Short Film Showcase 2025

description: Discover another world, a realm of weirdness and wonder, as a milestone of animation history, Mexico’s very first stop-motion feature film, comes to life on Fantasia’s big screen!
title: I Am Frankelda

description: Laughter and tears, joys and sorrows, but above all, a fresh look at an event we experienced collectively, but few have understood from the inside: the Oka crisis, as seen sensitively by a 12-year-old girl...

description: A bookworm drinks the blood of a serpent and becomes invincible in this outlandish kung fu-meets-STAR WARS classic.
title: Battle Wizard, The

description: Jermaine Fowler shines in a completely original and unpredictable dark comedy sci-fi thriller about belonging and paranoia, from the director of HOT TUB TIME MACHINE.
title: Terrestrial

description: Presenting captivating short documentaries and docu-fictions. With several character portraits that take us through a whole range of emotions.
title: Cinéma Vérité… et plus encore!

description: A shipwrecked alien disrupts two strangers’ lives in a rural village. As chaos unfolds, a government official and a bumbling cop add further pressure in this darkly funny yet surprisingly sweet sci-fi adve...
title: Stinker

description: Tamala is the cutest girl-cat in dystopian Cat Tokyo in this anime anomaly, a deviously dreamlike, metaphysical mind-melt of high-fructose, retro-futuristic, paranoid pop-art brilliance.
title: Tamala 2030: A Punk Cat in Dark

description: A nightmarish, alcohol-fuelled journey shot on 8mm, this Australian experimental feature follows the troubled Josie through the streets of Brisbane into the belly of the beast.
title: Grand Mockery, A

description: A program of short films for fans of science fiction and fantasy.
title: Science-Fiction et Fantastique

description: With unlikely allies, a plucky young indigenous girl performs miracles across Bolivia’s sublime landscapes, where survival becomes a sacred, elemental act of love and divine ritual.

description: A dive into the twisted shadows writhing under the rising sun, a riot of the beautiful, bizarre, radical, and outrageous, charting an underground art movement that still echoes hauntingly today.
title: Japanese Avant-Garde Pioneers

description: Four films that elevate genre filmmaking and truly show that Korean cinema is in a league of its own in this current day and age.

description: This hilarious action-comedy from Jun Ishikawa (Best Director at Fantasporto 2025) perfectly captures the sweet madness and eccentricity of the original manga.
title: Honeko Akabane's Bodyguards

description: In the near future, resources have run out, and a family must contend with dwindling water supplies, rival camps, and a deadly virus.
title: Well, The

description: An anthology horror film starring evil cats, what could be more Fantasia? Produced and directed by one of the pioneers of Quebec cinema, Denis Héroux.
title: Brrr... Version québécoise de THE UNCANNY

description: Dire omens and sexual perversions, clerical fanaticism and collective madness—an eerie, animated folk chiller from the Baltic region in which malevolent moments and sinister sights abound.
title: Dog of God

description: As women are going missing in Oklahoma, an office worker finds his life turned upside down after witnessing something he shouldn’t have in this absurdist dark comedy from Mickey Reece.
title: Every Heavy Thing

description: Struggling art student Mia Sunshine Jones must discover her artistic purpose or risk being expelled from school. When she takes Lucid, a candy elixir, she opens a dreamscape of memories and a ’90s grunge n...
title: Lucid

description: Un extraterrestre trouble l’existence de deux étrangers dans un village rural. Une aventure de science-fiction où l’humour noir rencontre une étonnante tendresse.
title: Stinker

description: Rylee meets her pop-star idol, only to find he’s a drug-addicted faker. When she decides to help him get sober, her good intentions become a road to a living hell.
title: Sweetness

description: Leaning into the bizarre, our Canadian short-film showcase is back and weirder than ever! Ghosts, guts, worms, creepy neighbours, and beefy dudes, Perilous Ports has it all!
title: Perilous Ports 2025

description: A new mother, exhausted from a difficult birth and sleep deprivation, struggles with haunting memories and the overwhelming demands of caring for her newborn son.
title: Peau à Peau

description: In an attempt to avenge her daughter’s death, Irene Kelly travels through parallel universes, killing her daughter’s murderer over and over again. A sci-fi vengeance thriller like no other.
title: Redux Redux

description: Between musical rivalries, police investigations, burning passions, linguistic squabbles and labour struggles in the ’50s, witness a duel that presents itself as an explosive social western.
title: Hank est en ville

description: A playful experimental film with shades of JEANNE DIELMAN about a woman trying to break free.
title: Contact Lens

description: In this John Waters-inspired dark comedy, a sex worker living in Trashtown must raise $1,000 to lift a curse in a filthy, absurdist quest through society’s underbelly.
title: Fucktoys

description: Rock ’n’ roll and friendship remain the mothers of invention. A look back at a Québec film evoking both early Jim Jarmusch and Gilles Groulx on its 10th anniversary.
title: Limoilou: Le film (événement 10 ans)

description: A nightmarish, alcohol-fuelled journey shot on 8mm, this Australian experimental feature follows the troubled Josie through the streets of Brisbane into the belly of the beast.
title: Grand Mockery, A

description: As women are going missing in Oklahoma, an office worker finds his life turned upside down after witnessing something he shouldn’t have in this absurdist dark comedy from Mickey Reece.
title: Every Heavy Thing

description: A brilliant, unsettling outlier for the Italian giallo. A haunting meditation on art, madness, and the failure of reason against pagan chaos, set in a village where silence conceals a disturbing legacy.
title: House with Laughing Windows, The

description: It’s Christmas, and Halloween, in July! The kooky, spooky stop-motion musical masterpiece, screening in honour of the composer of its score (and singing voice of Jack Skellington), Danny Elfman!

description: Fantasia’s showcase of bite-sized Asian tales of the macabre again offers a celebration of the otherworldly from the other side of the world.

description: An electrifying reinvention of ‘60s Euro-spy films from the gifted makers of AMER and LET THE CORPSES TAN, starring Italian screen icon Fabio Testi. An astonishing act of imaginative visual storytelling.
title: Reflet Dans Un Diamant Mort

description: A colourful supernatural romance follows a young woman escaping her small transphobic town, only to unleash a demon that begins killing all her friends.
title: Serpent’s Skin, The

description: Marjolaine Coppola is a cop with nothing left to lose. A missing sister, silent parents. Faced with a criminal empire headed by a cutthroat tycoon, she joins forces with Tie Man, a shadowy vigilante consum...
title: Tie Man

description: Alone in NYC with no wallet, no cellphone, and no fluency in English, can this day get any worse for fading screen star Shina? Then she meets passionate, low-budget filmmaker Jack.
title: I Fell in Love with a Z-Grade Director in Brooklyn

description: In an attempt to avenge her daughter’s death, Irene Kelly travels through parallel universes, killing her daughter’s murderer over and over again. A sci-fi vengeance thriller like no other.
title: Redux Redux

description: Young Natalia turns to witchcraft to give herself an upper hand against a changing world. The volcanic emotions of teenhood conveyed through a lens of supernatural horror.
title: Virgin of the Quarry Lake, The

description: After a robbery gone wrong, Anna (Catherine Brunet) sees a chance to turn her life around. But the price of freedom is high and she soon learns the past is not so easily left behind.
title: Anna Kiri

description: A surreal, 16mm psychodrama starring Lucy Fry, Madeline Brewer and Sheryl Lee that is haunting, ironic, and Lynchian, as it explores trauma, identity, and the horror of perfection.
title: I Live Here Now

description: A young girl diagnosed with cancer turns to necromancy under guidance from a witch in the woods. Can dark magic heal her? At what cost? A brilliant occult fairy tale from the directors of HELLBENDER.
director: Zelda Adams, John Adams, Toby Poser
title: Mother of Flies

description: A colourful supernatural romance follows a young woman escaping her small transphobic town, only to unleash a demon that begins killing all her friends.
title: Serpent’s Skin, The

description: A surreal, 16mm psychodrama starring Lucy Fry, Madeline Brewer and Sheryl Lee that is haunting, ironic, and Lynchian, as it explores trauma, identity, and the horror of perfection.
title: I Live Here Now

description: Take a wild ride through one of the scuzziest, seamiest entries in the New York City crime-film canon as James Brolin tears Manhattan apart to rescue his kidnapped daughter!
title: Night of the Juggler

description: Eugene Brackin, a repressed, armed accountant, holds his boss and colleagues hostage while they work overtime. A thriller with an unpredictable ending.
title: Hostile Takeover

description: Two unlikely people, a chef and an immigrant martial artist, search (and fight!) for the truth in the underbelly of Rome, in this massively entertaining mix of martial arts, crime and romance.
title: The Forbidden City

description: Lena finds herself trapped in a trailer of a mysterious stranger who says she’s infected and is being taken for treatment, in a supernatural shocker that journeys deep into unexpected territory.
title: Hellcat

description: A program of absolutely delirious short films featuring characters each more dysfunctional than the last.
title: Ma Gang de malades

description: From the director of ALL JACKED UP AND FULL OF WORMS comes a darkly comic erotic thriller about a bike-courier sex worker caught in a deadly small-town conspiracy and a serial killer's reign of terror.
title: Anything That Moves

description: Two students try to survive when their classmates start form a strange pyramid. This frightening reflection on our increasingly radicalized world is a future J-horror classic.
title: New Group

description: An HOA turns out to be more hellish than usual in this wildly amusing, creature-packed horror/comedy about newly minted suburbanites forced to take part in a battle against monstrous forces.
title: Hold the Fort

description: Celebrating its 20th anniversary, a defining work of Japan's millennial new wave of outrageously original pop cinema, guaranteed to confuse, amuse, repulse, and excite you!
director: Katsuhito Ishii, Shunichiro Miki, Hajime Ishimine
title: Funky Forest: The First Contact

description: Complications abound for a lovestruck monarch, a Parisian actress, and her playwright pal bringing Shakespeare to the Persian stage. A charming animated musical comedy celebrating cross-cultural curiosity!

description: Koji Shiraishi's unforgettable classic, the jewel in the crown of horror mockumentaries, is finally presented at Fantasia. A unique opportunity to rediscover one of the best J-horror films.

description: What will unfold when a village girl with the power to control time encounters a cold-faced assassin? Top-tier digital animation from China, with a heartfelt story and on-point humour.
title: Girl Who Stole Time, The

description: CW is on the prowl again. With the versatility of a chameleon and a spider’s skill in weaving a nasty web, she’ll welcome nasty twists and fatal errors in paradise!

description: From the director of the award-winning MASH VILLE (Fantasia 2024), a riveting, character-driven psychological thriller filled with non-stop tension and suspense.

description: As John Lennon sang: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans!

description: A codependent couple (Alison Brie and Dave Franco) are afflicted by an uncanny force that binds them in very uncomfortable ways. A smart, shocking marriage of body horror and troubled-relationship study.

description: Stories in which the protagonists find themselves in extremely frightening situations!

description: A seemingly cute, slightly sad, time-travelling romance somehow hasn’t worked out the way it should have. What went wrong?

description: Tai and his team of oddballs underdogs will have to combine their strengths in gaming if they’re to win a fierce esports competition.

description: Lena finds herself trapped in a trailer of a mysterious stranger who says she’s infected and is being taken for treatment, in a supernatural shocker that journeys deep into unexpected territory.
title: Hellcat

title: ChaO

description: George Mihalka's first feature film celebrates the summer of 1980 with its colourful arcana, funky, whiter-than-white music, gleaming cars, customized minivans and fashion victims.

description: A spectacular and exciting musical tournament powered by the new icons of J-pop and a deliciously bizarre story adapted from the popular manga.

description: “Remember that you're going to die.” This program brings us face to face with this reality in a variety of ways.

description: Podcaster Evy prepares for her mother’s death and becomes intrigued with a mysterious set of recordings that spirals into unexpected terrors.
title: Undertone, The

description: An ordinary office worker sees his apocalyptic manwha become reality before his very eyes. This spectacular fantasy action film delivers a disaster story to remember.

description: More than 30 works show that animation is alive and well in Quebec!
title: Animation Tous Azimuts!

description: A middle-aged coke fiend gets stuck in a bar’s toilet with drugs stolen from the resident dealer. A deliriously inventive thrill ride that consistently ups the ante in darkly comic sleaze and shock.

title: Woman, The

description: In this late-1990s queer classic, two friends remember Takachi, a young porn star from rural Japan who recently died.

description: Under the domineering, traditionalist art teacher Hidaka’s guidance, aspiring manga artist Akiko will have to learn to hold her ground and find her place.

description: Will you be brave enough to take on these ten international shorts, five of which are from Quebec? Come and laugh, thrill and jump with us...

description: Channel-surfing becomes a dramatic standoff as TV ads tell the sinister tale of a restaurant taking over an Albertan town.

description: A new experience in Canada puts an Iranian teen at odds with her family, her identity, and a dark presence.

description: It's inner city vs. outer space when best friends Amin and Mitchell battle aliens before their neighbourhood is obliterated in this super-fun and very funny Dutch sci-fi comedy.
title: Straight Outta Space

description: Stories where certain characters go through ordeals that will be turning points in their lives.
title: Rites de Passage

description: Two codependent best friends become addicted to the heroin-like touch of an alien narcissist who may or may not be trying to take over the world. A wild psychosexual comedy/horror creation.
title: Touch Me

description: Form, Truth, and Reason! After the first film’s sold-out world premiere at last year’s Fantasia, the Medicine Seller is back for more of the pop-psychedelic, paranormal-procedural anime phenomenon!
title: Mononoke the Movie: Chapter II - The Ashes of Rage

description: Fascinating stories that open doors to unsuspected worlds.
title: Multiples dimensions

description: When a zombie apocalypse breaks out on the night of a giant warehouse party, an eclectic group of drag queens, club kids, & frenemies must put aside their drama and use their skills to fight against the br...
title: Queens of the Dead

description: La jeune Natalia se tourne vers la sorcellerie pour avoir le dessus sur un monde en transformation. Les émotions volcaniques de l’adolescence à travers une vision d’horreur surnaturelle.
title: Virgin of the Quarry Lake, The

description: One stormy night, a fire engulfs a family home. In a nearby store, neighbours gossip and speculate: was it black magic, a woman’s madness, or a man crushed by life? A gripping mystery told in true RASHOMON...
title: Burning

description: A little penguin girl’s wish for the best birthday ever leads to an adventure full of strange surprises and new friends. A weird, wonderful, and award-winning animated journey for the little ones.
title: Thelma du pays des glaces

description: Beware of sexy ghost vixens knocking at your door! The beloved Hong Kong series concludes with another wild joyride of exhilarating kung fu, flying monks and monsters, and a kinky subtext!
title: Chinese Ghost Story III, A

description: Two codependent best friends become addicted to the heroin-like touch of an alien narcissist who may or may not be trying to take over the world. A wild psychosexual comedy/horror creation.
title: Touch Me

description: This program looks at the theme of belonging from different points of view. The pleasure of belonging to a group or community, or the pain of failing to do so.
title: Appartenance

description: After zombies, gangsters and a few superheroes, the imposing Don Lee (TRAIN TO BUSAN) takes on demons with his bare hands in this hard-hitting, truly horrific action film.
title: Holy Night: Demon Hunters

description: You have a rendezvous with shapes, colors and poetry, on a celluloid journey that takes you straight from daydreams to feverish nightmares.
title: Celluloid Experiments 2025

description: From the visionary director of PRIMAL and SAMURAI JACK comes an adult animated comedy about Bull, an average, all-around good dog who discovers he’s going to be neutered in the morning!
title: Fixed

description: A showcase of underground DIY, outsider, and bizarre cinema from around the world. This year the program dives deep into fetishism, transgressive sex acts, and macramé.
title: Collective Delusions 2025

description: Dating sites and new ways of connecting aren’t easy to navigate — regardless of age or preferences. Love can quickly become a real headache.
title: Old Guys in Bed

description: More than just a program of experimental shorts, a sensory experience made up of some 50 micro-shorts and short films, all thought up, dreamed up, and produced here in Quebec.
title: Révolutions tranquilles

description: Local loser Mike, desperate and overwhelmed, turns to crypto to keep from drowning in debt. Instead, he finds himself in a spiral of bad decisions in this darkly comedic tale of addiction and family.
title: $POSITIONS
